    • Method Detail

      • getTimeLinePosts

        public javax.swing.DefaultListModel<FacePost> getTimeLinePosts()
        Connects the Facebook Client with the posts of the user's time line. Creates a DefaultListModel. Scrolls through all the posts of all the pages of the user's time line. Filters the posts: they must have something written and have the word "ISCTE" also written there. Counts each post and filtered post. Prints the number, id, time when it was created and message of each filtered post. Adds the filtered posts to the DefaultListModel. Prints the number of filtered and total number of posts covered.
        Returns:
        Returns the DefaultListModel that contains the filtered posts.

      • useExtendedAccessToken

        public void useExtendedAccessToken()
        Creates an access token with an extended expired date with the use of the AppId and AppSecret. It uses the new token to create a new Facebook Client.

      • PostsList

        public java.util.ArrayList<FacePost> PostsList()
        Retrieves the user faceposts.
        Returns:
        list of facebookposts

        public static boolean isFacebookOnline()
        Checks if the facebook server is online
        Returns:
        server status.
